title: Interpretation of the demolition of the mosque in a dream - I saw the mosque being demolished in a dream

preview.html: The dream of demolishing the mosque indicates the emergence of blessings and goodness, and other interpretations, which we interpret for the single, for the married, for the pregnant, for the divorced, for the married and for the single. A man, such as the fall of the wall of the mosque, the demolition of the minaret of the mosque, or the roof of the demolished mosque, and the demolition of the minaret of the Al-Aqsa Mosque, or the Kaaba, or the Great Mosque in Mecca according to Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others in continuing the matter. Interpretation of demolishing a mosque in a dream Demolishing mosques in a dream is one of the most hated things. Visions, because they indicate a lack of goodness and blessings. Whoever sees in a dream the mosque being demolished and the dreamer is a judge or a minister, the vision is a sign that he will lose his position. Whoever sees the mosque collapsing in a dream, a religious leader will die in it. Whoever sees the mosque being demolished in a dream, the vision indicates separation from a lover or fiancé. Or the husband who saw the demolition of the mosque in a dream, then the vision is an indication that some bad things will happen soon. Seeing the mosque being demolished in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will lose some of those close to him. Demolishing the mosque in a dream indicates entering into some work or projects that are useless. Demolishing the mosque In a dream, it is a sign that you will fall into problems and misfortunes that require great effort to overcome. Seeing a mosque collapsing in a dream is a sign of failure in study and failure to achieve the goals that the person who had the vision wanted. Interpretation of demolishing a mosque and building another in a dream. Whoever saw in a dream demolishing the mosque and constructing another building next to it, the vision is An indication that the dreamer prefers his world over the other, meaning that he can eat the forbidden or something similar and intends to enjoy life without giving importance to the afterlife. Whoever sees that he is demolishing the mosque to build a bathroom in a dream, the vision indicates that the dreamer will spoil his religion or abandon his prayer. Interpretation of collapse. The mosque in a dream. In general, it indicates the loss of money, the loss of work, and the suffering and distress in life for those who see it, and God knows best. Interpretation of the demolition of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream. Seeing the demolition of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream, the vision is an indication that the dreamer will be involved in countless problems. The demolition of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream. It indicates bad things related to the religious duties of the Prophet, such as fasting and prayer. If a person sees himself demolishing Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream, then the vision is an indication of the presence of bad people who provide bad advice to the pioneer. Interpretation of demolishing a minaret in a dream. Whoever sees the demolition of the minaret of Al-Aqsa Mosque in a dream indicates The presence of a person in the life of the Messenger who tries to prevent him from performing prayer. Interpretation of demolishing the Kaaba in a dream: Whoever sees the destruction of the Kaaba in a dream, the vision is an indication of unlimited things that will happen soon. In the opinion, demolishing the Kaaba in a dream is a sign of the arrival of strife and the emergence of evil people who distort the religion and exploit it. And they make people hate him. Whoever sees someone he knows demolishing the Holy Kaaba in a dream, the vision means that this person will make the dreamer fall short of his duties and duties, such as fasting and prayer. Interpretation of the Kaaba wall falling in a dream The falling of the Kaaba wall in a dream and demolishing the Kaaba indicates that there is a very important person will fall or

title: Interpretation of seeing a wolf attack in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf attack

preview.html: Today we know the interpretation of seeing a wolf attack in a dream. The wolf is actually one of the predatory animals that pounce on people and cause severe pain and various injuries, but is there a sign of seeing a wolf in a dream? Is it a vision of good or evil? This is the question that comes to the mind of people who see a wolf in a dream, and they wake up feeling terrified and afraid and want to know the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream of a wolf attack. About these visions, follow us. Interpretation of seeing a wolf attack in a dream. The interpretation of a wolf attack in a dream varies depending on the details of the dream and what it said. Scientists about what it symbolizes: Imam Ibn Sirin says that a person who dreams of a wolf means that this dream means that the dreamer has a person in his life whose characteristics are hypocrisy and lies, and that this person does not feel towards him the good feelings that he shows to him. It is a warning message to him about that person. It is a good vision to see in a dream that a wolf turns into a human, and this dream indicates that the dreamer has committed transgressions and sins in his life and that he has repented of these sins and stopped committing them. A wolf attack in a dream is one of the bad dreams that a person sees In a dream, he sees a wolf attacking him. This dream means that there is a person spreading bad words about the dreamer in reality and the dreamer does not realize it. Some dream interpreters said that seeing a wolf attacking you means that you will suffer from some problems in your life, but there is no need to worry, because seeking help from God Almighty, praying, and trying to think about Solutions to these problems will help you overcome them. And God knows best. If the wolf that a person saw in a dream was attacking him in black, then this dream indicates that someone will steal something dear to the dreamer and that he will feel pain and sadness for losing it and not being able to get it back again. Seeing a wolf attacking in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a wolf in an unmarried girl’s dream varies depending on the details mentioned in the dream. If an unmarried girl sees a wolf approaching her in a dream, this dream means that this girl is connected to a deceitful and cunning person and that this person is deceiving her with love, but the truth is He wants to hurt her. She must stay away from that person and sever her relationship with him. If the wolf she saw was white, then this dream symbolizes that the girl feels love for him, but she does not reciprocate these feelings and it will cause her severe psychological pain, wound her heart and leave her alone and tormented. If she sees an unmarried girl in the Her dream is that a wolf is running after her and she is trying to escape from it and cannot catch up with it. This dream is a good dream, because it indicates the presence of a person in this girl. Life deceives her and wants to harm her, but God Almighty saves her from him and will not harm her. But if he catches up with her and manages to harm her, then this dream indicates that someone in her life will say harsh words that will hurt her and make her heart bleed. Interpretation of a dream about killing a wolf. Whoever sees in a dream that he is killing a wolf, This dream is a promising dream because it shows that the dreamer will be able to defeat his enemies and get rid of the machinations that have been placed on him, as it appears that these. Enemies will not be

title: Seeing him in a dream reciting Ayat al-Kursi to expel the jinn

preview.html: Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by expelling the jinn. All dream interpretation scholars have agreed on its interpretation. Read Ayat al-Kursi in a dream of chasing jeans. It is one of the best visions that anyone can see. This is because it is evidence of his salvation and his distance from all the bad days that were tiring in your life. This vision A good dream or an unpleasant dream. Interpretation scholars have confirmed that it is evidence of a person’s liberation from all negative thoughts running through his mind. He is trying with all his energy to get rid of the negative energy in his life to start a new happy life. Therefore, all scholars have agreed on its interpretation. Read Ayat al-Kursi in a dream about chasing jeans. It is one of the best visions that anyone can see. It is evidence of the abundance of goodness that will come to a person and his country in the near future. It is difficult to read Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream. Also, many scholars have said that when a person sees himself in a dream, he tries to read Ayat Al-Kursi, but there is Difficulty in that. This is evidence that he is one of the people who cannot hide feelings or facts from those around him. Some scholars said: It is difficult for a person to see himself reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream. This is evidence that a person will hardly get rid of problems in the following periods of his life. It is possible It may also be evidence of exposure to many negative things in his life. And he will try to get rid of them from among them. This person will also achieve that, but not soon. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream in front of the jinn. Interpretation scholars have agreed on its interpretation. Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream in front of the genie. It is a sign of goodness and blessing. And if the opinion is of a man, it means the fulfillment of many of his desires and things that he dreamed of achieving throughout his life. What if he saw this dream as a free girl, so she will be happy to marry a good man. She is one of the people close to her Lord, and whose behavior shows her great love for God and her religion. Interpretation of seeing Aya Al-Kursi reads aloud in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars also agree that seeing a person reciting Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream and out loud. This is a sign that this person will hear a lot of good news in the very near future. It is also evidence of how close a person is to his Lord and the extent of his connection to Him. And that God will help him in many of the matters that will come in his life, whether social, scientific, or practical. What if someone saw himself writing Ayat Al-Kursi while he was reading it out loud. The interpretation of this is that all the desires that this person dreams of will come true soon. Also Many scholars said that this dream is clear evidence of the transformation of a person’s life from negativity to many positive ones. Read the Qur’an out loud in a dream, it is a sign of solving many of a person’s problems. Interpretation of the vision of reading Ayat al-Kursi for unmarried womenDream interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that a woman is unmarried. A married woman sees herself in a dream while she is reading Ayat Al-Kursi. It is evidence that she will obtain a lot of goodness in her life. It will also keep away bad friends and haters. It is also an expression of her marriage to a good man who treats her with great love and

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about cats?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cats: Cats are pets that some people love to bring home and raise. Cats represent kindness to people, but what about seeing them in a dream? What does it symbolize? This vision carries many connotations and symbols that vary based on many details, including the color of the cat. It can be black, white, or colored, and its size. It can be large or small. The interpretation relates to what the person saw specifically. The cat may be dead. Or he lives in his house or gives birth, and what is important to us in this context is to mention the true meaning of seeing kittens. Interpretation of a dream about kittens: Seeing kittens in a dream represents a personality that strives to obtain freedom and remove restrictions from its shoulders, and strives for independence and complete self-reliance without referring to others. Or asking them for help, and they are serious about achieving many goals far from the surrounding circle. Cats express the misfortune that accompanies a person in the steps he takes, the obsessions that prevent him from reaching his goal faster, and walking according to doubts that the viewer is not sure of. As for To see kittens in a dream, this vision symbolizes fun and amusement, and dealing with matters simply, and this simplicity may not be true in some matters that require intense concentration and great acumen. Seeing a kitten in a dream can be an indication of one’s tendency to listen to its voice When making decisions and thinking based on the spirit of independence, but when the results of those decisions are negative and not what the person expects, he begins to blame others as if he was the reason for making these decisions. This vision also indicates disturbances in the emotional side and feelings that a person cannot express, Because of the loss of the ability to express it and his inability to understand himself properly. If a person sees cats and feels fear, this vision indicates anxiety about emotional experiences, fear of the idea of ​​marriage, constant distancing from any emotional relationship, or fear of the idea of ​​approaching a woman. I see Ibn Shaheen Cats symbolize To worries, sorrows, and unstable circumstances, and it takes a lot of effort and effort to get rid of the things that disturb the mind and spoil a person’s life, as well as frequent disagreements or estrangement with those you love. He sees great importance to him. If one sees cat meat, this is an indication that the money comes from illegal sources, and the money is mainly from theft. In the Miller Encyclopedia, it is good to see cats if the person kills them, throws them away, or avoids the road on which you travel, Or it was so far away from it that it was difficult to see it. Interpretation of a dream about cats by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing both small and large cats, that cats symbolize thieves who seek by all means and means to harm a person, rob him of the efforts he has made so much, and waste opportunities. He has to steal it. Cats may represent guardians who wish to serve those who supervise and manage their affairs. Y

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking beet juice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about drinking beet juice in a dream Dear reader, you may want to know the interpretation of a dream about drinking beet juice in a dream, so we present in the following lines all of this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about drinking beet juice in a dream Interpretation of dreams about drinking beet juice in a dreamIf a married man sees Beets, it may be sustenance for a child, and God knows best. If a married woman sees beets, it is evidence of goodness and livelihood, and God is the Most High, the Most High. If an unmarried girl sees beets in a dream, this may be a sign of the absent person’s return from his trip, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about drinking tomato juice in a dream. The interpretation of the dream. Drinking tomato juice in a dream could be evidence of financial changes for the better, and God knows best. If a single young man sees himself drinking tomato juice in a dream, this is evidence of goodness and getting rid of worries, God willing. When you see a married woman drinking tomato juice, this may indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows best. A divorced woman dreamed that she was drinking tomato juice, as this may indicate infidelity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drinking fig juice in a dream. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream drinking fig juice, then she may... This leads to marriage, God willing. When you see a divorced woman drinking fig juice, perhaps it will comfort her after distress, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy: Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream has many interpretations and associations, such as those that lead to good, tidings, and happy events, and others that bring with them nothing but sorrows and worries. The dream is in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy. There are many interpretations related to seeing the birth of a boy in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer sees in her dream the birth of a child, she will receive many gifts, material benefits, and abundant goodness in the very near future. Interpretation of the dream about the birth of a boy in the vision For a person, it leads to a change in circumstances for the better and getting rid of anxiety and exposure to anxiety, which leads to an improvement in the psychological state. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the connotations and meanings related to the dream of giving birth to a boy in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is a woman and she sees In her dream that she gave birth to a boy, this is a sign of a disaster that will bring her many problems and negatively affect her life. If a woman dreams that she gives birth to a boy, but he dies in her dream, then this vision is not good and leads to separation from the one she loves, which leads to her great sadness. If a woman sees herself giving birth to an attractive boy in her dream, she will be able to find excellent solutions to all the obstacles and obstacles that prevent her from happiness and restore stability to her life. If the dreamer is divorced and she sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a handsome boy, then she will be able to reach the heights of glory in all areas of her life very soon. What is the interpretation of the birth of an unmarried boy? A guardian’s monitoring of one child has many interpretations and indicators, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is single and sees in her dream the birth of a child, this is a clear indication of the arrival of good news and happy moments in Her life in the coming period. If a virgin sees that she is giving birth to a child in her dream, she will have the opportunity to marry a loyal young man and a good man who can bring joy to her life and she will be happy with him. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried boy with an ugly and unwanted face, and indicates that he is facing problems And difficulties and difficult times that cannot be overcome in the coming period. Seeing an unmarried woman who has given birth to a child from someone she loves is a clear indication that he is always on her mind and there is no explanation as to why all the events are the work of the subconscious. If a girl dreams that she is giving birth to a boy Ugly in appearance, this is a sign that she will enter into a toxic emotional relationship that will bring her problems and harm her. What is the interpretation of a dream about a married woman giving birth? If a married woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a son, this is an indication that she is living a miserable married life without stability, peace and comfort due to many disagreements. With her partner and his family, which drives her to do so. Enter into a spiral of sadness. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy for a married woman with a feeling of sadness in the vision symbolizes the arrival of goodness and prosperity, the expansion of means of livelihood, and the restoration of the financial condition that she will see in her life in the coming period. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to a boy and he

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, crying, a man who cries over heavy death, tears in his voice, and more according to Imam Al-Sadiq on the authority of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of crying in a dreamCrying in a dream is promising and some cause anxiety, and this depends on the dreamer’s condition and the context the dream. You have most of the clues. To see crying accompanied by screaming and screaming is evidence of sadness and pain for what he is crying about. Seeing crying accompanied by screaming, and not knowing what he is crying about, indicates exposure to worries. Seeing him crying without screaming or mourning is evidence of freedom from heartache and worries, and long life The dreamer and the rain falling. Whoever sees that he is crying with people as they walk behind a funeral and their crying without crying or screaming also indicates the disappearance of worries and the entry of pleasure into his home. Seeing crying while reading the Qur’an and remembering sins indicates joy and pleasure. Whoever sees that his eyes have tears without crying, He will achieve what he wants. Seeing crying without tears, this vision is not worthy of praise, even if the tears flowed blood, then it regrets the loss and repents. And whoever sees that he cried over a person, he knows that he died and he cried and they died. Wow, it falls as he sees it on the page of the dome of the calamity of death, or worry. Seeing the eyes filled with tears is a sign of... Obtaining legitimate money: Whoever sees that he is crying and then laughs after that, this indicates the nearness of his death, according to the words of God Almighty (and that he laughs and cries, and that he causes death and brings life) Surat Al-Najm, 53. Interpretation of intense crying in a dream The dream interpretation jurists, led by Ibn Al-Nabulsi, say: Intense crying in a dream expresses happiness, pleasure, and joy after severe distress, and crying sometimes indicates travel and alienation. Interpretation of slapping and screaming in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees himself screaming and being slapped in the face in a dream, this means that this person will suffer from a disease in His life and that this disease will cause a distortion in the beauty of the face. But if a person sees in a dream that he is being slapped in the face, this indicates that this person will be exposed to severe oppression and oppression. As Ibn Sirin says: slapping the cheeks indicates awakening after neglect and a state of distraction, and if he sees If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying loudly and forcefully, without slapping or screaming and in a low voice, this means freedom from worries, the end of need and adversity, and the marriage of girls. However, dream interpretation scholars say that a girl who cries loudly and loudly during her sleep is not worthy of praise at all, as this indicates the loss of a loved one and she is expected to receive very sad news. Interpretation of intense crying in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars say about a married woman crying In her dream, it expresses great joy and relief after hardship and comfort after hardship. Crying also expresses increased livelihood and happiness in life. A funeral, and this indicates that he heard the news of death. But if the wife sees in her dream that her husband is crying silently without a sound, and his tears

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog falling without pain

preview.html: This is what we present today through our article from your website gptafser.com/ about seeing the top dog falling in a dream for women and men in detail. Interpretation of seeing the top dog falling without pain in a dream for a single girl. Seeing the top dog falling in a dream is for a single girl who feels sad and tired in her life. Good news about nutrition and a lot of money on her way. It could be an inheritance, and God knows best. Either the upper pessimist will fall and fall to the ground in the dream of an unmarried girl. A metaphor for a person who is interrupted by her family, and God knows best. The unmarried girl who is watching her upper dog falls into her lap in a dream. The dream symbolizes marriage to a rich, healthy man who makes her happy and does not need anything, and God knows best. And when an unmarried girl sees her upper canine teeth falling out in a dream with severe pain. Evidence of illness, and God knows best. A single girl sees her upper canines falling out in a dream without pain. This means that he will actually be freed from An abusive relationship. It indicates that the dreamer gets rid of her problems and solves them on her own, and God knows best. Seeing the upper dog falling, and the unmarried girl felt pain in the dream. A metaphor for the death of the head of the family, who is her father, and God knows best. An unmarried girl dreamed of seeing her upper dog falling and falling into her hand in The dream. Good news that she will marry a good man very soon. Or it means that she will be very good in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth. Interpretation of seeing the upper canine falling without pain in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams of seeing the upper canine falling without pain in a dream. The vision is an indication that she will enter a new phase in her life full of joy and happiness. A married woman who sees in a dream her upper canine teeth falling into her lap. In a dream and you do not feel any pain. It is a good sign of pregnancy after the waiting period, and God knows best. When a married woman with children sees in a dream the upper canine tooth falling out with pain. It is a bad vision for her, and indicates her children’s failure to study, and God knows best. Seeing the upper canine tooth falling out On the ground in a married woman’s dream. It symbolizes the death of her husband, and God knows best. Or it may mean that there is a major disagreement with her husband that leads to divorce, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the upper canine falling without pain in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams of his upper canine falling out and he is falling on his arms without pain. Pain. The vision is a metaphor for goodness, for many livelihoods for him and for blessings to come into his life. As for the man who dreamed of an overhead dog falling into the man’s hand in the dream, he was working in trade. The dream indicates financial gains and a large profit in business. The man who watches the fall The upper canine tooth in a dream without pain. An indication of longevity, and God is the Most High. In the event that you see the appearance of blood while the upper canine tooth falls out in a man’s dream. An indication of the presence of a disreputable woman in the life of the dreamer, and he must sever his relationship with her, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation Dream of teeth falling out

Interpretation of a dream about burning my sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about burning my sister in a dream may indicate her high status, and God knows best. The unseen: When a married man sees his sister burning in a dream, this may represent the high status he has attained, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees her sister burning in a dream, this may mean that she has reached a prominent position, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his relative burning in a dream, he can It expresses kindness and achieves a status of prestige, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burning my wife in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about burning my wife in a dream and burning the eye can express poor vision, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of hair loss in a dream and hair loss from the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of hair loss in a dream Hair loss in a dream is one of the things that may cause some discomfort to whoever sees it, whether male or female, and we will explain why all the scholars’ interpretations express an opinion about this dream and whether it carries its connotations. The good or evil that we find appears according to the details of the individual’s vision and his social position. What is the interpretation of hair loss in a dream? When a girl finds that her hair is falling out, this dream carries different meanings than the loss of a married, divorced or widowed woman. Here is some of what the interpreters said in specifying the details of the vision: If a man sees that he is combing his hair and is surprised that a lot falls out in front of the mirror, then he usually has many reasons that disturb his life, but the next few days will bring him good news, unlike what it is. He suffered in the past. As for the girl who regrets her frequent rupture, she is thinking about marriage and sees that it is far behind her peers, which may cause her some depression, which she quickly overcomes and realizes that there is the wisdom of the Creator (Glory be to Him) for it. Delaying her marriage. There are places where it is advisable to lose hair or remove it yourself, such as mustache or armpit hair for men and women. In a dream, this means that circumstances will improve for the better. If he is going through financial difficulties, he will soon be released from prison without having to borrow from someone else. Hair loss Or its falling in a dream if a person is afflicted with an illness, this indicates that the period of his illness may be prolonged, and he must be patient and calculate until God grants him recovery. Some interpretive scholars said that its falling carries positive connotations, as the dreamer’s life will extend for many years, and if he feels anxious or sad, he will be reassured. His heart and his mind will be at peace during the coming period. What is the interpretation of hair loss in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The Imam said: Hair loss is different from cutting a person’s head or pubic hair, because the loss is against his will and in many cases indicates the presence of a certain disease, either a deficiency in Organs of the body or due to a skin disease. As for the dream, it has many meanings, such as: If the current period in the dreamer’s life is experiencing a lot of turmoil, then he must persevere in dealing with it until it ends well. It has been said about the dream that he is in trouble through someone close to him who does not like goodness and seeks to ruin his life whether Be it professional or personal. If he is looking for a job and gets a suitable offer, he hesitates a lot before making the decision to accept, which leads to rejecting the job and regretting it later. If she falls completely in love with the man’s dream, there are responsibilities added to the burdens that she bears until she feels unfulfilled. The ability to carry on and look for someone to carry it, whether it is a husband or a friend. , if he is available to do so. What is the interpretation of hair loss in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq said that hair loss in a woman’s dream means the end of a difficult stage in her life. If he is experiencing marital disputes, they will be resolved soon. Without obstacles. With all the positives that the imam sees in this dream, he also said: If the dreamer is a mature man and sees that the hair on his entire head is falling out until it appears to him as something,

Hair loss Or its falling in a dream if a person is afflicted with an illness, this indicates that the period of his illness may be prolonged, and he must be patient and calculate until God grants him recovery. Some interpretive scholars said that its falling carries positive connotations, as the dreamer’s life will extend for many years, and if he feels anxious or sad, he will be reassured. His heart and his mind will be at peace during the coming period. What is the interpretation of hair loss in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The Imam said: Hair loss is different from cutting a person’s head or pubic hair, because the loss is against his will and in many cases indicates the presence of a certain disease, either a deficiency in Organs of the body or due to a skin disease. As for the dream, it has many meanings, such as: If the current period in the dreamer’s life is experiencing a lot of turmoil, then he must persevere in dealing with it until it ends well. It has been said about the dream that he is in trouble through someone close to him who does not like goodness and seeks to ruin his life whether Be it professional or personal. If he is looking for a job and gets a suitable offer, he hesitates a lot before making the decision to accept, which leads to rejecting the job and regretting it later. If she falls completely in love with the man’s dream, there are responsibilities added to the burdens that she bears until she feels unfulfilled. The ability to carry on and look for someone to carry it, whether it is a husband or a friend. , if he is available to do so. What is the interpretation of hair loss in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq said that hair loss in a woman’s dream means the end of a difficult stage in her life. If he is experiencing marital disputes, they will be resolved soon. Without obstacles. With all the positives that the imam sees in this dream, he also said: If the dreamer is a mature man and sees that the hair on his entire head is falling out until it appears to him as something,
